abstract: Police officer shoots Mickey Cecil Davis in Nitro, W Va, after Davis attempted to hit officer with his car; Davis remains in intensive care.
lead_paragraph: A police officer who was following a car whose headlight was out shot the driver Wednesday after the man attempted to hit him with his vehicle, the authorities said.

headline.main: West Virginia: Officer Shot Driver Who Tried to Hit Him, Police Say
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Officer Shot Driver Who Tried to Hit Him, Police Say

snippet: A police officer who was following a car whose headlight was out shot the driver Wednesday after the man attempted to hit him with his vehicle, the authorities said.
